Title: Quill You Help?
Description:
My scribe apprentice, I am delighted to see you.

Earlier today I had a few novices come in to try their hand at inscription. They all wrote with too much force and snapped their quill nibs right off!

I hate to ask, but could you craft a few more quills to keep in stock?
ObjectivesText: Craft 2 Scribe's Fastened Quill for Talendara in Valdrakken.
